name: Hep B: Patient is 18 years - 5 days with first dose of Hep B (Hepislav) vaccine
generalDescription: This test cases describes when a patient is administered a dose of the Hep B (Heplisav) vaccine at 18 years - 5 days that the dose is not valid.
reasonForChange:
v4.1: Updated forecast dates to reflect a 0 day interval for administration of any age appropriate HepB vaccine. 
v4.0: Updated dose #1 to reflect an invalid dose reason of 'Vaccine product was not a preferable or allowable vaccine for this series'.
v3.5: Updated dose #1 to reflect an invalid dose reason of Vaccine Dose Administered was administered at too young of an age.
testcaseName: Hep B: Patient is 18 years - 5 days with first dose of Hep B (Hepislav) vaccine
